Content: I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.
The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart
To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you
I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone
I choose you. And I'll choose you over and over and over. Without pause, without a doubt, in a heartbeat. I'll keep choosing you
When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage
Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop
Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive
When love is not madness it is not love
"I wish I could turn back the clock. I'd find you sooner and love you longer
You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear
I want you. All of you. Your flaws. Your mistakes. Your imperfections. I want you, and only you.
True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does
If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours	 if they don't, they never were.
If you love two people at the same time, choose the second. Because if you really loved the first one, you wouldn’t have fallen for the second
Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own
To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return
Just because someone is single doesn’t mean they’re lonely. Some people are in relationships and they’ve forgotten what happiness is.
You know when you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction
If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues
If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues
It’s useless to hold a person to anything he says while he’s in love, drunk, or running for office
If you remember me, then I don’t care if everyone else forgets
Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit
When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before
Happiness isn’t getting what you want, it’s wanting what you got
If you are not happy with a person, leave. And wait until you find that one person who makes you feel good about yourself every single day and is not expecting you to change but to grow
There comes a time when you have to stop crossing oceans for people who would'nt even jump in puddles for you
Best lesson I ever learned in life came from the worst feeling I ever felt in life
Every guy thinks that every girls' dream is to find the perfect guy. Every girls' dreams is to eat without getting fat
If we date there will be moments when I will just stare at you and smile, know that in those moments I'm appreciating everything about you

Your heart is a map	
I lost my way inside of	
Say you'll take me home
Missing you is the hardest thing I've got to deal with
You don't deserve a paragraph. You deserve a thousand books written about how amazing you are
Someday you will look back and know exactly why it had to happy
One galaxy, eight planets, one hundred ninety six nations, seven seas, seven billion people, yet my heart still runs after you
Seeing someone slowly lose interest in you is probably one of the worst things ever
I hope one day someone asks you about him and you laugh instead of feeling a double edged dagger on your chest
One of the hardest decisions you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder
The thought of kissing you keeps me awake at night
A good heart is always breaking
I pushed everyone else away because they weren't you
I fell in love with the way you touched me without using your hands
Sometimes life doesn't want to give you something you want, not because you don	t deserve it, but because you deserve more
I can talk to hundreds of people in one day but none of them compare to the smile you can give me in one minute
I reward loyalty with loyalty. I rewart disloyalty with distance
The worst feeling is when you feel like you're annoying the only person you wanna talk to
It felt like heaven when you kissed me so I ignored all the times you put me through hell
The first kiss is the last to be forgotten
Some people are like a drug. Make you feel great for a bit then terrible from the inside out
Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost it
It was supposed to be us against the world and now it's me against myself and it fucking hurts to breath
Sometimes, the only reason why you won't let go of what's making you sad is because it was the only thing that made you happy
One day you'll just be a memory to some people. Do your best to be a good one
Find someone who believes in you when you don't
It hurts like hell when you know that you need to let go of someone but you can't because you're still waiting for the impossible to happen
They say don't look back, but sometimes it's important to see how far you've come
It's about who you miss at 2 in the afternoon when you're busy, not 2 in the morning when you're lonely
Be with someone who makes your Monday's feel like Friday's
I wish I had the power to ignore you like you ignore me
Everytime my phone buzzes I hope it's you missing me
I'm in love with the idea of you and me still together in the future
Missing you comes in waves. Tonight I'm drowning
Fall in love with the person who made you believe in soul mates when you had no hope there was anyone in this world who was right for you
Distance sometimes lets you know who's worth keeping and who's worth letting go
I don't remember falling in love with you. I just remember holding your hand and realizing how much it was going to hurt when I would have to let go
Everybody wants something to happen but everybody's too afraid to make the first move
The human heart always forgives no matter what it is told
Some eyes touch you more than hands ever could
The same eyes that taught me to love, taught me I'd never be good enough to be loved back
I'm homesick for arms that don't want to hold me
Sometimes you just need to distance yourself from people. If they care, they'll notice. If they don't, you know where you stand
I wonder what goes through your mind when someone mentions my name to you
I saw him, and I couldn't  differentiate between my heart breaking and my heart fluttering
My loyalty runs real deep that's why I'm extra selective on who I give my loyalty out to
I wanna be the girl who makes your bad days better, the one that makes you say, "my life has changed since I met her"
I say its his loss but ddep down I know its mine too
Everybody is a main character to someone
I want a relationship with someone who never has me guessing where I stand with them
Just because you took longer than other, doesn't mean you failed. Remember that
How a person reacts to your sadness says a lot about how long they're going to be in your life
I hate you because I will have to wonder for the rest of my life why I wasn't enough
We build stories in our heads and we stick to them until you are finished or they finish us
Sometimes you have to accept that people's part in your story is over
You know you really love someoone, when you don't hate them for breaking your heart
I want to write a novel about silence. The things people don't say
I would drop absolutely everything and fly across the world to see you
It's hard to look at other faces when I only want to see yours
No matter what I do, my mind is always full of you
People will promise you to stay and leave you the next day
I want to be the one you choose when everyone else wants you
Be with someone who always wants to know how your day was
